title: Ranked Status/ Unfair ranked system?
body:
Unfortunately due to the past few games, almost all my games, I feel I must speak out. Lately, during my solo/duo ranked games, I have been encountered by players who are intentionally feeding, leaving intentionally and bad sportsmanship. I am aware these players are found throughout the game of League of Legends and many other games, but I can't help but feel that I have been placed with these players due to an all of a sudden losing streak and unfortunately that losing streak does not end.

Please review this riot. I am suffering in solo/duo ranked games. They are not fun when playing with players who do not take ranked seriously.

replies.body: Riot cant force a change of mindset of immature people.

i think what he is wanting is for riot to place him/her with at least some ppl who are able to hold their own in game... he/she doesn't want to be constantly stuck with sucky ppl because they lost a few

Not exactly, what I'm saying is that the ranked system can be fixed by not grouping up people who are on losing streaks together. As well as adding a system that recognizes a leaver in the team or afk player so that I don't lose my lp so often.

Which is impossible, because not everyone has their best game everygame.

Besides, they cant be any worse than him if they are in his games.
